text: @realDonaldTrump TODAY people started losing their jobs? Where have you been? Speaking of "do nothing." Your response to the COVID-19 was something a 3rd grader could have done well. Please let the grownups & experts address this issue. You take care of the rat infeststation in OUR White House. https://t.co/xZeBedTFow
